name: MightyVoice, Inc.
description: Provider of an application software intended to be used for sending and receiving text messages and phone calls. The company's software offers a platform where one can send and receive SMS and MMS from a computer or tablet, using Android phone number, enabling users to keep their messages in sync with the phone's SMS inbox and never miss notifications.
one_liner: Provider of an application software intended to be used for sending and receiving text messages and phone calls. The company's software offers a platform where one can send and receive SMS and MMS from a computer or tablet, using Android phone number, enabling users to keep their messages in sync with the phone's SMS inbox and never miss notifications.
